Name: The Thing: Space X
About the game: Boundless cosmos, a distant constellation in an unknown galaxy. You are a pilot of a spacecraft. Your task is to clear the sector of enemy fighters and destroy the main threat - a leader by the name of a 'Thing'. At your disposal are a dozen of the best combat spacecraft equipped with death beams, machine guns and missiles. The sector is divided into several subsectors, which swarm with enemies. In the end, you will have an unbeatable boss - the 'Thing'. Play the classic genre game 'kill them all' space shooter.
